text: If you use personal data with UiPath cloud products, UiPath will be processing data on your behalf and will be considered a data processor under the GDPR.

Privacy at UiPath

UiPath will process your email for account provisioning and for securing your cloud account.

data_type: information result from use of product call
text: To ensure the fair use, security, and reliability of our products, we process information resulting from the use of our products, called telemetry.
UiPath maintains strict control over who has access to production environment and customer data.
